nodes.bodyText: Is it possible to rename thread back to "idle-XXX" once the execution is complete?

It already sets the name to the original here: https://github.com/temporalio/java-sdk/blob/30420212a26283cf7cbe6339512058a3186074e8/temporal-sdk/src/main/java/io/temporal/internal/sync/WorkflowThreadImpl.java#L126
